It was a seemingly normal day in Domino City, and Yugi was on his way to the park to meet with his friends.

"Hey Yugi! Wait up!" he heard someone call out to him, and turned around to see Tea walking over to him.

"Oh, good morning Tea." Yugi greeted her.

"Good morning." she replied. "Oh, by the way, I just found something." she said as she held out a blank duel monsters card.

"Its blank? That's weird." he said as he took it from her. It was green, indicating it was a spell card, but there was no name, picture or text.

"I just found it on the ground and figured that I'd show it to you since you know more about the cards than I do."

"Its definitely weird." he said as he looked it over.

131111.content:
He, him, himself = Akiza and She, her, herself = Yusei

As he took the sight before him in, Akiza recoiled back in surprise. "Wh-whats going on here?" he sputtered out. "What just happened? And why am I seeing myself?"

"Just relax and lets figure this out, it's me Yusei." Yusei said, trying to remain calm and calm down the former girl before her.

Akiza breathed in deeply, and did as he said. "You're right. Freaking out won't solve anything."

"Okay, now lets try to figure this out." Yusei said.

"So what are we going to do, Yusei?" Akiza asked.

"I'm not really sure." Yusei said. "But from what I can tell, we've switched bodies with each other."

"How did this whole thing happen?"

"I'm not really sure, but I think it has something to do with the card you found." Yusei said, holding up the "Body Swap" card in her hand.

"I feel like this is my fault. If I hadn't found that card and showed it to you, none of this would have happened."

"Hey, don't blame yourself." Yusei said. "Its not your fault."

"Anyway, what should we do right now, Yusei?" Akiza asked.

Yusei thought about the situation. They would need to try and find a way to fix this. But they didn't really have any leads on that, only the card that had caused it, and didn't know how to make it work again. They could try to find out more about the card. But without really knowing much about, they wouldn't really know where to start. They could just take it easy for now, but that had its own problems. They were each other, so they would have to pretend to be one another for now. Meaning she would have to go back to his place and act like her in front of his parents while he stay to the garage and pretended to be her with Jack and Crow. She didn't really want to, but if they couldn't fix the problem today, it would eventually come to that whether she wanted to or not, so it might not be a bad idea to start sooner than later.

It was a seemingly peaceful and ordinary day in New Domino City, and the young twins, Leo and Luna were currently walking on their way to Yusei, Jack, and Crow's garage. As they did, Leo noticed something on the ground nearby, and stepped over to check it out. "Hey Luna, check this out." he said as he picked it, which was apparently a card.

"A card? What is it?" Luna asked.

"Weird... Its completely blank. No picture, name or text." Leo said as he looked at it.

"Well, its green, so I guess that means its a spell card." Luna said.

"I guess." Leo said, then handed it to his sister. "Hey, does it have a spirit?"

"Well, usually only monster cards do, but no, it does." she said as she took it from her brother and looked over the card. Suddenly, the card began to glow, and then emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

"Yeah that's me. How did we end up here anyway, pointing to his body?" Leo said.

"I have no idea. We were on our way home on our Duel Boards, and then there was a flash of light, and we ended up in the bodies of Yusei and Aki." Luna said. "Wait a second, do you still have that card you found?"

"Huh?" Leo asked, but quickly caught on. Unfortunately, the card was not in his hand. "No. Its gone. But I don't remember letting go of it, and I had it before that flash..."

Luna sighed. "It figures you'd lose something important like that."

"Hey, its not my fault!"

"Anyway, lets not argue. We should really try to find out what's going on here." Luna took a good look around the room, but saw no one else there. She then turned to the Duel Runners. "Hey, we can use Yusei and Akiza Duel Runner to drive to the place where we found the card and see what happened with our bodies." she said as she walked over to them.

"Thats a good question." she says. "Maybe we could try looking for them. They might be just as confused as we are."

"Hey! Yusei! Akiza!" Akiza(In Leo's body) said and waved as she saw the two of them coming up. She spoke in a much different tone that she usually did, sounding more excitable and childish.

"Oh? Did you two finish your duel already?" Yusei(In Luna's body) said softly, speaking in a gentle and innocent childlike tone, notably different than his usual tone.

To say this was a surreal experience for the twins was an understatement. Here they were in Yusei and Akiza bodies and then here was Yusei and Akiza, both of them in a situation that was similar, but they were acting like and believing that they really were them!

"Uh, yeah, we did. We were just in the area and saw you two and thought we'd stop and say hello." Luna(In Yusei's body) said. She had been hoping that Yusei and Akiza would be as aware of the situation as they were. The possibility that they might actually believe that they were really Luna and Leo hadn't occured to her.

Even Leo(In Akiza's body) could tell what was going on in this situation, and he wasn't really sure about what to say. Then, he noticed something in one of Akiza's hands. It looked like a card. Then he thought of something. "Ak-Uh, Leo, whats that in your hand?" he asked, almost calling Akiza by her actual name instead of who she believed herself to be. He had almost forgotten that as far as anyone else knew, he was Akiza for now. Still, it was so weird to be calling her by his own name.

"You mean this?" she said as she held it up, revealing that it was indeed a card. "Its some really weird card I found a little while ago. Its blank, and only has its name, "Body Swap," on it." she explained, confirming Leo's suspicions.

"Really? Would you mind if I took a look?" Luna asked as she got off of Yusei's Duel Runner.

"Sure thing, Yusei." Akiza said as she handed it over to her.

Luna looked it over and Leo got off of Akiza's Duel Runner as well and looked over his sister's shoulder. It was definitely the card that he had picked up earlier, and what they could only think had caused this situation. "Would you mind if I hold onto this for a while, uh, Leo? I'm curious about it." she asked, thinking to herself about how weird it was to call Akiza by her brother's name.

"Yeah, sure, no problem. You can keep it if you want. Oh, unless it turns out to be a super powerful card! Then I definitely want it back!" Akiza said, early jumping a bit in her apparent excitement as she said the last part.

'Sooo weird.' Luna thought to herself. "Sure. I'll let you know if I find anything out."

"Thanks a lot, Yusei!"

"Anyway, we should be getting home, Leo. We've got to go to our classes at the Academy tomorrow." Yusei said.

"Yeah, you're right. Anyway, see you guys tomorrow!" Akiza said and waved as the two rode off on the Duel Boards.

"Did you find that to be as weird as I did?" Leo asked as soon as the two were gone.

"Definitely." Luna replied.

It was a peaceful and normal day in New Domino City and Leo is currently waiting on Yusei in the garage, because he wants to show him a card. Crow was out on deliveries, and Jack was elsewhere and Yusei was testing his Duel Runner.

While it boring, is he heard the sound of the door opening. "Yusei? Are you here?" he could Akiza ask as she entered.

"Hey Akiza!" Leo said

"Hey, Leo. Are you only here?" she asked.

"Yeah. When I arrived, no one was in the garage." he said as walked over to her.

"Why are you waiting on Yusei?" Akiza asked.

"I found this strange card on the ground and picked it up and figured that I'd show it to Yusei." Leo said as he held out the card for Akiza to see.

"Weird ... Its completely blank?" Akiza questioned as she examined it.

Then suddenly, the card began to glow, and emitted a bright light that engulfed the two.

As the light died down, Leo then groans, as she wakes up feeling strange and rubs her head feeling curly hair. "What on earth was that?" she muttered, as something suddenly has occurred to her "Huh... my voice sounds like Akiza's!?"

"Wh-wha...?" Leo began, as she glances around. Something was wrong she thought; she felt a heavy weight on her chest and feels two straps on both of her arms, she reaches it to find out what they are, then she feels her chest moves around and bounces. Gulping she tentatively glances downwards. And found herself staring at Akiza's impressive breasts.

"WAAAH!!" Leo screamed as she jumps to her feet and promptly falls down, not used to her new center of balance and lands on her new breasts. Then she feels pain on her new chest thinking because of the boobs and causing them to bounce and jiggle on her causing her to moan a little more loudly. She screams as she then, spots her former body with Akiza in it. Her scream, woke up Akiza (In Leo's body), who immediately sat up.

"What's wrong?" he said. As he took the sight before him in, Akiza recoiled back in surprise, when he saw his former slender, shapely body with Leo in it. "Why am I seeing myself?" he sputtered out.

"Wh-what is with my voice sounding weird?" he said in surprise, before he finally looks down, at himself and his fears were confirmed, as he saw a young male body clad in Leo's clothes.

"I will not be stuck, like this for the rest of my life." she said frantically, as she walked to her former body in panic. “That card did this” she said in Akiza's voice with anger.

"Just relax and lets figure this out, it's me Akiza." Akiza said, trying to remain calm and, trying to calm down the, former boy before him.

Leo breathed in deeply, and did as she apologizes. "This is my fault. If I hadn't found that card, none of this would have happened."

"Its not your fault." Akiza said.

"Anyway, what should we do right now, Akiza?" Leo asked, as she staring at her new, impressive breasts and decides to poke them. Then the boobs bounce and jiggle on her. "Oh man, this is so cool!" she said.

"Leo!" he scolded. "I think the card, can fix the problem." he said.

Akiza thought about the situation. They would need to try and find a way to fix this. But they didn't really have any leads on that, only the card that had caused it, and didn't know how to make it work again. They could try to find out more about the card. But without really knowing much about it, they wouldn't really know where to start.

134212212.content:
"Oh. There you are." They hear Yusei call out to them. They find him hanging out with Leo's, or rather Akiza's, twin sister Luna.

"H-hey, Yusei," Leo shyly shutters. For some reason, just looking at Yusei's toned body makes her feel funny, physically and mentally. Luna just smiles at her coyly while Akiza is not sure of what to think. Yusei, of course, has not noticed.

"Something wrong, Akiza?" Luna lets out a giggle. Akiza lets out a sound, but stops himself when he remembers that he is supposed to be Leo right now. This doesn't go unnoticed from Luna, though. "What's with you, Leo?"

"Nothing!" Both Akiza and Leo shout a bit too loudly. Leo especially seems shook up, judging from her blush and her still staring at Yusei's abs. The other two now see that something is indeed odd.

"You sure?" Yusei asks. "You two don't look like you are feeling well." With the jig already being up, should the swapped boy and woman tell the truth?

1412.content:
It was a seemingly normal day in Heartland, and Yuma was was walking down the street, with Astral floating along behind, unseen by all but him. As he did, he noticed something on the ground. "Huh? Whats that?" he said as he walked over to it to see what it was. He found that it was a strange blank card. "Thats weird. Its blank." There was no name, picture or text. The only distinguishing thing about it was the color, green, which told him it was a spell card.

"Such a strange card." Astral commented.

"Yeah." Yuma says

As he wondered about the card, he heard someone call out to him. "Hey Yuma! Whats up!" Looking around, he saw someone flying toward him on a familiar flying cannon. He knew only one person with such an object.

"Oh, hey Anna." he greeted her.

"Whats up?" she replied as she jumped off of the vehicle/weapon.

"I was just walking and found this weird card." he told his friend as he held it out for her to see.

"Huh? Its completely blank." she said as she looked at it.

"Yeah, its really weird." Yuma said

"I wonder if it does anything." Anna wondered aloud as she looked it over.

Then the card emitted, a bright light that, engulfed the two then...

What happened?

info.brief_description: What title says. 40-160 or 60-240 GPs for real chapters.
info.description:
The characters of the Yu-Gi-Oh! series undergo changes.

He and she and other words like that be called the opposite gender must now be after the swap and has to be awake to make this reference first,

Physical, mental(optional on mental). Just keep things constant and must each be a male and female.

For the paths of those two characters, the changes always need to affect both.

They can also swap bodies with characters from a other anime series or video games, if they do put them at that place instead of in their world, they grew up and gain the person they swap bodies with memories.

You can put them in the world they grew up in, but everyone's memories that didn't swap their memories, are altered since knowing that person and the people that did, swap gain the new memories that alter around them as well as their own, sayYugi swapped bodies with Orihime from Bleach and remained, in his world he would gain the new memories that occur while what happened to him, since they were instead put into their world at birth, Yugi would gain those memories since their world changes as well as his own.
